author: Behance
title: Day One! Drawing & Animating Mermaids in Space using Adobe Fresco!
text: Day One! Drawing & Animating Mermaids in Space using Adobe Fresco! Description Hello and welcome to the stream! I am AND_WOMAN also known as Melissa Showers. I am an artist and interactive art director based out of Houston, TX! Hello! Working on a NEW drawing from mostly my imagination in Adobe Fresco and having fun with animations and motion graphics! say hi in the chat :) + Join my [DISCORD](https://discord.gg/HwbT2MQY2Q) for more community chats, ai reference images & art + Subscribe on [YOUTUBE](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzeBFmH2_z5_tQeHXWZp1UQ) @and_woman + Follow me on Streaming from my IPAD PRO directly from Adobe Fresco!
